import React from 'react'; import api from './Api'; import {Card, Button,Row,Col,Container,Table,Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; class Triador extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state ={ processos: [], id:0, description: '', } } componenDidMount(){ api.get("/processo/") .then((res)=>{ // console.log(res) this.setState({ processos:res.data, id:0, description: '', }) }) } submitProcesso(event){ event.preventDefault(); api.post("/processo/PostProcesso/",{ description:this.state.description, }) .then(()=>{ this.componenDidMount(); }) } render(){ return ( <> Cadastro Processo
this.submitProcesso(e,this.state.id)}> Descrição this.setState({description:e.target.value})} value={this.state.description} type="text" id="description" name="description"/>
this.submitProcesso(e,this.state.id)}> Tipo Usuário this.setState({type:e.target.value})} value={this.state.type} id="type" name="type">
{ this.state.processos.map(processo=> ) }
# Processo Atribuir
{processo.id} {processo.description}
); } } export default Triador;
